short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When noise removed, pure info remains

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you still believe it if there is no title and status quo?

A persuasive argument is persuasive because its content is persuasive or just because it comes from an authority?

PureInfo is an extension that will help you remove all distraction.

When noise removed, pure info remains.
